items.sentence: We went out on the field and played as well as we could.
I\'m tired of waiting to do all the things I want to do.
Tom wondered why Mary wasn\'t as busy as everybody else.
Most hotels provide a free shuttle bus from the airport.
Tom hasn\'t eaten at a restaurant since he lost his job.
Tom drove by Mary\'s house every day on the way to work.
Tom expected Mary to disagree with him, but she didn\'t.
I\'m glad the guys who broke into your house got caught.
I don\'t think anyone suspected you weren\'t really Tom.
I don\'t think that I need Tom\'s permission to do that.
